short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clone a repository with DevPod in one click! Adds DevPod buttons to Github repositories and pull requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clone a repository with DevPod in one click! Adds DevPod buttons to Github and GitLab repositories and pull requests.

When you click the button, the extension will send you to https://devpod.sh/open with the current repository and branch name. Doesn't require any authentication or access to any accounts, no registration or logins or anything.

This requires DevPod to be installed to function properly.
